author: mariusvanderwijden
content: <@583892532644151312> Lets discuss here if you want

author: yperbasis
content: Ah, OK, makes sense. I thought of something else.

author: smartprogrammer
content: <@360491619402776577> is being nice to accommodate for https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7542 if it lands. but the consensus on this one is yet not clear.

author: smartprogrammer
content: if we include 7639 in its current form, seems that all clients are forced to not share historical data (even if they have it locally) which means 7542 is useless and should be withdrawn

author: smartprogrammer
content: in the case the we make serving historical data on p2p optional instead of forbiding it all together. then 7542 makes sense and should be bundled with 7639
